title: AkulaShop2
author: AkulaShop2
content: Hello friends.I selling  verified accounts various wallets , platforms for crypto trading and e-banks with EU IBANS and virtual cards My accounts are of the best quality.Accounts legal  made by real people, not hackingAfter payment You will get full access from account: login;pass from account account and login;pass from e-mail access,  access to a phone number if neededAfter receiving the details about account , I recommend setting up account security in all possible ways.To buy, write to me at the contacts at the  bottom or in my autoshop ( There have feedback) https://akulashop.atshop.io/Below provided only a small part of my products , if you are interested in a product that is not on the list, write to me if it is in stock, I am also ready to do custom verification at your request Verified Cryptowallets:Binance EU Visa Virtual included (Can load money on card from crypto)BitPay USA  Mastercard Virtual included (Can load money on card from crypto)Paxful Noones (Its new Paxful) Bitget                                                                                                               BitStampBitfinexBitpandaBitvavoBlockchain GoldByBitCashAppCex.ioCoinListCoinPaymentsCoinbaseCoinmamaCrypto.comCryptopay CryptovoucherEtoroGate.ioGeminiHuobiKrakenKucoinMercuryoMexcNexoOkexUpholdWhiteBit Verified E-Banks:AdvcashAnnabankBBVABankeraBarter.meBitsaBlackcatcardBunqCapitalistContistDipocketDucascopyDzingExcelon MoneyFinciFinomFlutterwaveGenomeGetpentaGlobexFranceIbanicoImaginJoompayKriptomatLydiaMoneyJarNeocardNetellerPaxumPayeerPayoneerPaysafecardPaysendPayseraPaytendPockitQiwiQuppyRevolutSimplexSkrillSpectocoinVerseW1ttyWebmoneyWesterncardWirexWiseZeniCard_______________________________________________________________________________ _________________For wholesale buyers, the price is discussed individuallyWarranty 3 days from the date of purchase (If you start using the account - the warranty is void because I don't know how you use the account) My contacts:Telegram: darkakula or https://t.me/darkakula  (safe way to avoid scam)Discord : Darkakula#9934Autoshop: https://akulashop.atshop.io/ Warning: Please check my contacts, especially in Telegram, there are a lot of clones of scammers, my username in Telegram @ darkakula, my nick Akula Shop (and I DON'T HAVE ANY CHANNELS IN TELEGRAM)Also you can see my vouchers on other forum or in my shop
